foreignData.name: Citanulflöte
foreignData.text: X, {T}: Durchsuche Deine Bibliothek nach einer Kreaturenkarte mit Gesamtspruchkosten von X oder weniger. Nimm die gesuchte Karte auf die Hand, nachdem Du sie allen Spielern gezeigt hast. Mische Deine Bibliothek danach neu.

foreignData.name: シタヌールのフルート

name: Citanul Flute
originalText:
o
X, oc
T: Search your library for a creature card with total casting cost no greater than X. Reveal that card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your library afterward.

rulings.text: X can be zero if you want.
You look in your library but you do not have to choose a creature even if you have one that meets the criteria.

text: {X}, {T}: Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
